column4: can you do updates with dpkg using the package file? the .deb file that is
you can use dpkg -i to install .deb files, but it is not recommended and it won't take care of any dependencies
if i have one version installed.. will it "overwrite" that?
if the version is newer: yes, it will. Chances are as well that it doesn't detect that it is an already existing application and only overwrites the files,
